name: Dana's Hot Dog Scramble
ingredients: 2 ounces cheddar or Deluxe American cheese, shredded or diced *

instructions.en: Heat butter in a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add sliced hot dogs and chopped onions. Cook until onion is tender and hot dogs have browned.
instructions.sk: Na strednom ohni rozohrejte maslo v stredne veľkej nepriľnavej panvici. Pridajte nakrájané párky a nasekanú cibuľu. Varte, kým cibuľa nezmäkne a párky nezhnednú.
instructions.ja: 中火で中サイズのノンスティックフライパンにバターを熱し、スライスしたホットドッグとみじん切りの玉ねぎを加えます。玉ねぎが柔らかくなり、ホットドッグが茶色くなるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Add beaten eggs, salt, and pepper. Cook over medium-low heat until nearly done.
instructions.sk: Pridajte rozšľahané vajcia, soľ a korenie. Varte na stredne nízkom ohni, kým nie sú takmer hotové.
instructions.ja: 溶き卵、塩、コショウを加えます。中低温で、ほぼ火が通るまで調理します。

instructions.en: Add cheese and continue cooking until eggs are set and cheese is melted.
instructions.sk: Pridajte syr a pokračujte vo varení, kým sa vajcia neustália a syr sa neroztopí.
instructions.ja: チーズを加え、卵が固まりチーズが溶けるまで調理を続けます。

notes: Makes 2 servings. Do not freeze. *The carb counts are based on using hot dogs that have 1 net carb each and Deluxe American cheese, not cheese food singles.
